data.name: WelcomeEmail
data.value:
WELCOME

*[name]*

Welcome to Invitee. We are thrilled to see you here!

At Invitee we take your most memorable & cherished images, add our magic to it to create elegant and exquisite photo and video montages.

As a special thank you for signing up with us, we're giving you one free video template.

Want more free video templates? Share your referral code with friends, family, and colleagues, etc. Encourage them to signup with Invitee your referral code.

 

Your referral code: [referral code]

 

 

Cheers,

Team Invitee
